title: NoSleep Podcast - Waiting for Ten
description:
We're in-between Seasons 9 and 10 so to tide you over we have two stories while you wait.
  "The Orangutans Are Skeptical of Changes in Their Cages" written by Zachary Adams and performed by Peter Lewis & Mike DelGaudio & Dan Zappulla & Jesse Cornett & Elie Hirschman & Jeff Clement. (Story starts around 00:02:20)
 "Arkansas Sleep Experiment" written by Jared Roberts and performed by Mike DelGaudio & Peter Lewis & Atticus Jackson & Mick Wingert. (Story starts around 00:34:00)
  Click here to learn more about the voice actors on The NoSleep Podcast  
 Click here to learn more about the NoSleep Live Tour 2018  
 Click here to learn more about Zachary Adams  
 Click here to learn more about Jared Roberts  
  Executive Producer & Host: David Cummings
 Musical score composed by: Brandon Boone
 Audio adaptations produced by: Phil Michalski
 "Waiting for 10" illustration courtesy of Krista Neubert

content:encoded:
We're in-between Seasons 9 and 10 so to tide you over we have two stories while you wait.

"The Orangutans Are Skeptical of Changes in Their Cages" written by Zachary Adams and performed by Peter Lewis & Mike DelGaudio & Dan Zappulla & Jesse Cornett & Elie Hirschman & Jeff Clement. (Story starts around 00:02:20)

"Arkansas Sleep Experiment" written by Jared Roberts and performed by Mike DelGaudio & Peter Lewis & Atticus Jackson & Mick Wingert. (Story starts around 00:34:00)
